Windup 6.3.5.Final Javadoc
  • All Classes
 

Package org.jboss.windup.config.loader

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LabelLoader
    Loads all LabelProviderLoaders in the system.
    LabelProviderLoader
    Defines a way Windup can load LabelProviders.
    RuleLoader
    RuleLoader manages loading Configurations from all AbstractRuleProviders in the system.
    RuleProviderLoader
    Each configuration extension will implement this interface to provide a list of WindupRuleProviders.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultRuleProviderLoader
    Default implementation of RuleProviderLoader that uses Furnace to load RuleProvider instances and establish relationships with their corresponding RulesetMetadata if available.
    LabelLoaderImpl
    Tales all LabelProviderLoaders available in the system and use them to load LabelProviders.
    OverrideRule  
    RuleLoaderContext  
    RuleLoaderImpl  
    RuleProviderSorter
    Sorts RuleProviders based upon their executeBefore/executeAfter methods.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IncorrectPhaseDependencyException
